gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
content: Welcome to the DGRV Sustainability Assessment Platform! This tool helps your cooperative measure and improve its sustainability practices.
Your dashboard provides access to assessments, action plans, and progress tracking tools.
If you're an organization administrator, you can create new assessments and manage team members. Organization users can answer assessments and track progress.

roles.title: Understanding User Roles
content: Organization Administrator (org_admin): Can create new assessments, manage users, and view all organization data.
Organization User (Org_User): Can answer assigned assessments, view results, and manage action plans.
Both roles can access the dashboard, view submissions, and export reports for their organization.

assessments.title: Taking Assessments
content: Assessments are organized into categories (e.g., Environmental, Social, Governance) with questions in each category.
For each question, provide: Yes/No response, percentage completion (0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%), and detailed text explanation.
You can attach files to support your answers (max 1MB per file). Use the paperclip icon to add documents.
Save your progress anytime using 'Save Draft'. Complete all questions in a category before moving to the next one.
Once submitted, assessments go through a review process before final approval.

actionPlans.title: Managing Action Plans
content: Action plans help you track improvement tasks based on assessment recommendations.
Use the Kanban board to move tasks through stages: To Do → In Progress → Done → Approved.
Add new tasks, set deadlines, and assign team members to track progress effectively.
Regular updates to your action plan demonstrate continuous improvement efforts.
Export action plans to share progress with stakeholders and management.

viewingResults.title: Viewing Assessment Results
content: Access all your submissions through 'View Assessments' on the dashboard.
Track submission status: Pending Review → Under Review → Approved/Rejected/Revision Requested.
View detailed feedback and recommendations from reviewers to understand improvement areas.
Compare results across different assessment periods to track your cooperative's progress.
Use the submission view to review your answers and supporting documents.

creatingAssessments.title: Creating Assessments (Admins Only)
content: Organization administrators can start new assessment cycles for their cooperative.
Click 'Start Sustainability Assessment' to create a new assessment draft.
Share the assessment ID with team members so they can contribute to different sections.
Monitor progress and ensure all categories are completed before final submission.
Only submit assessments when all required sections are thoroughly completed.

userManagement.title: Managing Team Members (Admins Only)
content: Organization administrators can add and manage team members through 'Manage Users'.
Invite new users by email and assign appropriate roles based on their responsibilities.
Assign category access to users so they can contribute to specific assessment areas.
Remove users who no longer need access to maintain security and data integrity.
Regularly review user permissions to ensure appropriate access levels.

reportsExports.title: Reports and Exports
content: Export assessment reports in PDF format for sharing with stakeholders and boards.
Use CSV exports for data analysis and tracking trends over time.
Download Word documents for detailed documentation and reporting purposes.
Regular report generation helps demonstrate continuous improvement efforts.
Share reports with members and stakeholders to maintain transparency.

bestPractices.title: Best Practices for Cooperatives
content: Involve diverse team members in assessments to get comprehensive perspectives on sustainability practices.
Provide detailed, honest answers with specific examples and supporting documentation.
Use assessment results to create realistic, achievable action plans for improvement.
Regular assessment cycles (annually or bi-annually) help track progress and maintain momentum.
Celebrate improvements and share successes with your cooperative members and community.

troubleshooting.title: Common Issues and Solutions
content: Can't access assessments: Check with your organization administrator about role assignments and category access.
Assessment not saving: Ensure you're completing all required fields (Yes/No, percentage, and text explanation).
File upload issues: Files must be under 1MB. Try reducing file size or using different formats.
Can't see other team submissions: Only organization administrators can view all submissions.
Missing assessment categories: Contact your administrator to verify category assignments for your organization.

beforeStarting.title: Before Starting:
items: • Involve team members from different areas
• Set aside adequate time for completion

duringAssessment.title: During Assessment:
items: • Be honest and specific in responses

overview.title: Platform Overview
content: The DGRV Sustainability Assessment Platform is designed to help cooperatives across Southern Africa measure and improve their sustainability practices.
As an administrator, you have access to comprehensive tools for managing organizations, users, assessment content, and reviewing submissions.
The platform supports multiple languages and works offline to accommodate various connectivity challenges in the region.

organizations.title: Managing Organizations
content: Add new cooperative organizations to the platform with their basic information and domain settings.
Configure organization-specific settings and manage user access for each cooperative.
Monitor organization activity and ensure proper data isolation between different cooperatives.
Archive or remove organizations that are no longer active while preserving their historical data.

users.title: Managing Users
content: Create and manage user accounts across all organizations with appropriate role assignments.
Assign users to specific organizations and configure their access permissions.
Monitor user activity and manage account verification status.
Ensure proper security by regularly reviewing user access and removing inactive accounts.

categories.title: Managing Assessment Categories
content: Configure assessment categories that align with sustainability best practices and local requirements.
Set appropriate weights for each category to ensure balanced assessment scoring.
Organize categories in logical display order for optimal user experience.
Regularly review and update categories based on feedback and changing sustainability standards.

questions.title: Managing Assessment Questions
content: Create comprehensive questions within each category to thoroughly assess sustainability practices.
Provide questions in multiple languages to support diverse cooperative communities.
Set appropriate weights and display order for questions within each category.
Regularly review and update questions based on assessment results and stakeholder feedback.

reviews.title: Reviewing Assessments
content: Review submitted assessments thoroughly, considering both quantitative scores and qualitative responses.
Provide constructive feedback and specific recommendations for improvement.
Use standard recommendations to ensure consistency across multiple assessments.
Approve, reject, or request revisions based on assessment quality and completeness.

recommendations.title: Standard Recommendations
content: Create reusable recommendation templates for common assessment scenarios and improvement areas.
Maintain a library of high-quality recommendations that can be applied across different cooperatives.
Regularly update recommendations based on best practices and successful improvement strategies.
Ensure recommendations are practical and achievable for cooperatives of various sizes and resources.

systemHealth.title: System Health and Performance
content: Monitor platform performance, database health, and API response times regularly.
Review sync queue status and ensure data synchronization is working properly.
Export system reports and audit logs for compliance and troubleshooting purposes.
Maintain regular backups and ensure data security across all platform components.

support.title: Supporting Cooperatives
content: Provide guidance to cooperatives on using the platform effectively for their sustainability goals.
Offer training and support materials to help organizations maximize the value of their assessments.
Monitor assessment trends and identify opportunities for platform improvements.
Build relationships with cooperative leaders to understand their unique needs and challenges.

regularReviews.title: Regular Reviews:
items: • Review pending assessments at least weekly
• Monitor system health and performance metrics
• Update categories and questions based on feedback
• Maintain active communication with cooperative leaders

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance:
items: • Ensure consistent review standards across all assessments
• Provide detailed, actionable feedback to cooperatives
• Regularly backup system data and configurations
